alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:51PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A line of weak thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 150 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of weak thunderstorms 21 miles northwest of Knolls, or 21 miles east of Wendover, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Lucin and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
